meanings.sent1: The jugate twins wore matching outfits.
meanings.sent2: The jugate birds flew in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The jugate socks refused to be separated in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: Their jugate shadows danced on the wall as they walked hand in hand.
meanings.sent5: The jugate puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.

meanings.sent1: The jugate of friends always stuck together.
meanings.sent2: The jugate of shoes by the door belonged to the siblings.
meanings.sent3: The jugate of keys jingled in her pocket as she walked.
meanings.sent4: The jugate of lovebirds chirped happily in their cage.
meanings.sent5: The jugate of stars shone brightly in the night sky.
